definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

sentences.english: The result was emphatic victories at the Australian Open, Wimbledon and U.S. Open.
sentences.chinese: 最後結果是他贏得了澳網，溫布頓和美網。

sentences.english: The travel show was on hiatus during coverage of Wimbledon.
sentences.chinese: 該旅遊節目因爲轉播溫布頓網球賽而暫停播出。

sentences.english: Strawberries and cream are the quintessential Wimbledon treat.
sentences.chinese: 草莓和奶油是經典的溫布頓甜品。
